title: Can't access SAM directly from the OO or Audit page
content:
You can't access SAM directly from the OO or Audit page, though it's displayed in the menu.

Cause

When visiting SAM from OO or Audit, the port number of OO or Audit is wrongly included into the SAM URL as well.Â 

Workaround

You can visit other modules of Service Management from the OO or Audit page at first, and then redirect to SAM.
